sentences.english: Sukh Sagar Indian Restaurant serves exotic Vegetarian Cuisine from India.

sentences.english: “I was thinking more in terms of a fancy French restaurant, ” I replied.

sentences.english: Experience the plush comfort and enjoy exotic splendor of these thatched cottages .
